content: Lifestyle Career Asked by AnonymousAsked on 18 Feb 2019Do most people have a side gig on top of their normal 9-6 day job?Thinking about doing something for fun on the side to break the monotony of work and earn a bit of money too. Whatâ€™s your take on this?2 answersAnswerBump1

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Absolutely! I'm not that normal, so I have about 6 things running at the same time including my career. But it's good to have other streams of income. Never rely fully on just one. 2 comments3
Question Poster19 Feb 2019Wow 6 things?? That's crazy, care to share? :PHariz Arthur Maloy19 Feb 2019Emcee, sing, act, run facebook ads, write copy, business/online advertising consultancy. :)

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019The things I enjoy doing won't be able to earn me money (sadly), so nope, I do not have a side gig.Interested to know what to others think though! Other than tuition, I can't think of anything that people can earn a bit of money from =/1 comment1
